EmailTemplate.description: Sent to Sumo user if his calendar connection fails
EmailTemplate.name: Calendar Connector Error Sumo User
EmailTemplate.subject: Please check your SUMO Calendar Connection
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We have detected an error with your SUMO Calendar Connection. Please follow the below steps to disconnect and reconnect your calendar to resolve the error.
Navigate to User Settings Click on Calendar Connector Locate the + sign to the left of your User Name and click on it Click Disconnect Connect Your Calendar
Thank you,
SUMO Support Team
